title: After nearly 50 years, FBI identifies “Lady of the Dunes” murder victim
description: Tennessee native Ruth Marie Terry was 37 years old at the time of her 1974 murder.

title: New Mac app wants to record everything you do—so you can “rewind” it later
description: Find "anything you've seen, said, or heard" using 3,750x compression.

title: Google Play Games beta now on Windows desktops, if that’s your thing
description: Try some of Android's quirky games with mice, keyboards, and bigger screens.

title: Intel’s oft-delayed “Sapphire Rapids” Xeon CPUs are finally coming in early 2023
description: CPUs have been trickling out of Intel, but still waiting for volume shipments.

title: Why Pfizer’s RSV vaccine success is a big deal, decades in the making
description: Research on RSV vaccines dragged after a trial in the 60s went tragically wrong.

title: Today’s best deals: Black Friday month begins with 4K TVs, iPads, and much more
description: Dealmaster also has gaming mice, smart home devices, MacBooks, and Roomba robot vacuums.

title: Nudity comes back to Tumblr, but sexually explicit images still banned
description: Users can now label sexy posts as "mature" or having "sexual themes."

title: Avatar: The Way of Water trailer brings us closer to a mighty heartbeat
description: "We cannot let you bring your war here."

title: No room for another monitor? Use your desktop’s side panel instead
description: An intriguing idea, but Embedded DisplayPort limits compatibility.

title: Dwarf Fortress on Steam gets release date, trailer, and graphics beyond ASCII
description: Early next month, you can experience sublime subterranean chaos—with sprites.

title: Musk meets with critics, says Twitter won’t restore banned users before election
description: Musk: Twitter will consult civil rights groups before restoring any banned users.

title: $550 PlayStation VR2 launches on Feb. 22, 2023
description: Six games available for preorder alongside headset on Nov. 15.

title: SpaceX is now building a Raptor engine a day, NASA says
description: "This, by the way, is very high on their top risk list."

title: US senator seeks antitrust review of apartment price-setting software
description: Senate committee chair wants FTC to examine software sold by Texas-based RealPage.

title: Honda aims for a solid-state-powered EV by the end of the decade
description: The automaker is battling the dendrite problem with a polymer fiber coating.

title: Video games invade the art world in MoMA’s Never Alone exhibition
description: Are games art? Who cares. Exhibit is more interested in how they bring us together.
